posts.post_content: Nice PSA 2 example here.  $13,500 registered mail that will require a sig.  I also have a pc805 Cobb/Wagner listed and would take $20k on the pair.  Feel free to ask any questions and thanks for looking.

Reduced to $12,500.

Would be interested in partial trades, focus on Cobb/Detroit Pcs and 796s and early 19c stuff.
Open to offers on the card and partial trades.  Into Cobb, Matty, Wags and WaJo and early 19c items.  LMK what you got, motivated to move this.
